articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Enlarged Meeting of WPK Central Military Commission
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Enlarged Meeting of WPK Central Military Commission 
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea was held under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, chairman of its Central Military Commission, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA). 
					 Present at the meeting were members of the WPK Central Military Commission, executive members of the KPA Party Committee, senior officials of the General Political Bureau, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, departments and sections of the General Staff of the KPA, commanding officers of all the services and corps-level units, military academies at all levels, senior officials of the organs of state security and people's security, the WPK Central Committee, Cabinet and the field of foreign affairs and chief secretaries of the Provincial Party Committees. 
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed the revolutionary measures taken by the WPK and the DPRK government under the most dangerous situation which reached the brink of war, successes, experience and lessons drawn from the course of implementing them. On the basis of them, it discussed important strategic tasks to bolster up the national defence capability as firm as iron wall. 
					
					 The meeting also discussed measures for recovering from the flooding which hit Rason City and dismissed some members of the WPK Central Military Commission and appointed new ones and dealt with an organizational matter. 
					
					 Informing its participants of details of the recent crisis, Kim Jong Un analyzed and reviewed the preparations for military operations made by the frontline units which had been in the state of war and the work done in various fields in the areas where the semi-war state had been declared and how the north-south high-level urgent contact was made and appreciated them. 
					
					 He said that under the touch-and-go situation the WPK displayed its correct leadership art by steering the whole country, all the people and the service personnel and made resolute decisions and set forth strategic policies for putting the difficult situation under control. 
					
					 All the people turned out as human bullets and bombs to defend the revolution and the front and rear and the service personnel and people single-mindedly came out in the courageous actions to protect the country, he said, adding that the might of the whole state and all-people unity was something unprecedented. We protected the dignity and sovereignty of the country, the gains of the revolution and the happiness of the people by our own efforts amid the tempest of the history without anybody's support and sympathy, he noted. 
					
					 He said that this time the DPRK proposed the north-south high-level urgent contact on its own initiative and put under control the situation which inched close to an armed conflict, thereby clearing the dark clouds of war that hung over the Korean nation and defended peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The joint press release published at the contact provided a crucial landmark occasion of defusing the acute military tension and putting the catastrophic inter-Korean relations on the track of reconciliation and trust.
					
					 He said that the DPRK's sovereignty and fundamental interests can never be bartered for anything and dialogue and peaceful climate contrary to them are meaningless.
					
					 Noting that peace restored under the situation that reached the brink of a war was by no means something achieved on the negotiating table but thanks to the tremendous military muscle with the nuclear deterrent for self-defence built by the great party as a pivot and matchless ranks single-mindedly united around the party, he emphasized that the armed forces of Songun and the single-minded unity that have grown stronger amid the tempest of the times always serve as an essential guarantee for defending peace on the peninsula.
					
					 Underscoring once again the need to channel top priority efforts into bolstering up the military capability for national defence, he specified strategic tasks and ways for doing so.
					
					 Informing the meeting in detail of the flood which hit Rason City recently, he issued an order of the supreme commander of the KPA to it to undertake the work for recovering from it and complete it before the anniversary of the founding of the party and organized a command for the campaign.

articles.title: Friendship Cultural Delegation Leaves for Far Eastern Region of Russia
articles.content:
Friendship Cultural Delegation Leaves for Far Eastern Region of Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A friendship cultural delegation headed by Kim Yong Sik left here on Friday to visit the Far Eastern Region of Russia.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Leaves for Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus led by Jang Ryong Sik, its head and chief conductor, left here by air on Friday to visit Russia.
					 Departing together with it were leading members of the newly-organized Chongbong Band.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnamese Ministry of Public Security led by Nguyen Kim Quy, vice director general of the General Bureau of Security, left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Join Youth and Students Celebrating Youth Day
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Join Youth and Students Celebrating Youth Day 
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials joined youth and students celebrating the Youth Day (August 28).
					 Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae and other officials and those in Pyongyang and local areas went to the Jangchon Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Sadong District, Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Mangyongdae Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District, Sangwon Cement Complex, Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and other industrial establishments, farms and universities across the country and congratulated the youth and students on the day.
					
					 They, together with youth and students, laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling great leaders, mosaics depicting them and monuments to their revolutionary activities, and made bows to them.
					
					 After going round rooms for the education in the revolutionary history, rooms dedicated to the history of the above-said units, production sites, etc., they met with exemplary youth and students and encouraged them.
					
					 They told youth and students to discharge their missions and duties as masters of the power of the youth without an equal in the world by performing miracles and innovations and breaking through the cutting edge science and technology. 
					
					 The youth and students spent the pleasant holiday, having colorful cultural events like art performances and sports and amusement games.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador to DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy Friday to mark the 55th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Su Yong, foreign minister, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said in a speech that the Cuban and Korean peoples have dynamically waged the joint struggle for defending the sovereignty in the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists in the past period.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the Korean people would demonstrate only victory and glory in the future, too, under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said that the Cuban people would further develop the friendly and cooperative relations provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries and strengthen mutual cooperation with the DPRK in the international arena.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said that the Cuban people have achieved fresh successes in the struggle for defending socialist gains while frustrating all the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges under the correct leadership of Comrade Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 He noted that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il rendered material and moral assistance to the Cuban people in their struggle in the period when the U.S. imperialists frantically moved to nip the Cuban revolution in the bud.
					
					 He stressed that over the past 55 years the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have been steadily consolidated in various fields including politics, economy, military affairs and culture.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., Youth League
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., Youth League
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Friday, the Youth Day.
					 The performance started with small choruses "Song of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League" and "Joy of the People". Put on the stage were colorful numbers including mixed duet "Campfire" and mixed chorus "Train to the Front".
					
					 In narration and poem and male solo "Golden Cushion", poem and story-telling "Care of the Great Sun," etc. the performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by consistently considering the idea of attaching importance to youth as the most important affair of the revolution and laying an eternal groundwork for building a power of youth through energetic leadership and the great personality of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is building a grand garden of flowers loving young people.
					
					 The numbers staged convinced the audience that thanks to the huge army of the best young people in the world trained by the peerlessly great men, the country will as always shed its brilliant rays all over the world as the power of the youth prospering full of youthful dynamism.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league and youth and students.

articles.title: Evening Gala of Youth and Students in Pyongyang Held
articles.content:
Evening Gala of Youth and Students in Pyongyang Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- An evening gala of youth and students in Pyongyang took place at Kim Il Sung Square on the evening of August 28, the Youth Day.
					 The evening gala started amid the playing of the song "March of Korean Youth".
					
					 All the participants danced in deep reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un who is ushering in a new heyday of the Korean youth movement true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They danced to the tune of "Whistling Boy" and other merry songs. Reflected on their faces were pride and self-esteem as members of the young vanguard in the Songun era.
					
					 "Youth and Courage", "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation" and other songs resounded forth, revving up the festive atmosphere.
					
					 Overseas Koreans and foreign guests joined youth and students in cheerful dances.

articles.title: Stamp Jointly Issued by DPRK, Russia
articles.content:
Stamp Jointly Issued by DPRK, Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Russian Federation jointly issued a stamp in commemoration of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Seen in the stamp are letters reading "Joint issue of the DPRK and Russian Federation".
					
					 The stamp features the Arch of Triumph in Pyongyang, which was built to convey the feats of President Kim Il Sung who led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory to achieve the historic cause of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Men's Premier Soccer Finals for Torch Cup Held
articles.content:
Men's Premier Soccer Finals for Torch Cup Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- There took place the men's premier soccer finals for torch cup at the May Day Stadium on the Youth Day.
					 In the finals the April 25 Team beat the Kigwancha Team 5:1.
					
					 The Kigwancha Team and the Team of the Ministry of Light Industry won the second and third places.

articles.title: Rosy Is Future of Songun Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Rosy Is Future of Songun Korea: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is the power of the youth which is demonstrating its indestructible might with the strong mental power and spirit of the young vanguard remaining true to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Friday, the Youth Day.
					 The power of the youth without an equal in the world has been built under the loving care of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who put forward the young people as the main units of revolution and brought them up to be the reliable young vanguard of the WPK in the whole protracted period of their leadership over revolution, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean youth movement has now greeted a new heyday of its development thanks to the politics of attaching importance to the youth by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is the great pride of the WPK and the Korean people to have the proud generation dynamically opening the road of advance for victories in noble ideological and moral spirit, extraordinary militancy and wind-like speed and the large contingent of the youth who have grown in the flames of Songun.
					
					 Today the Korean young people are discharging their mission and duty as the successors to revolution taking the same breath and keeping the same pace with the Party Central Committee.
					
					 The ideal and ambition of the Korean people are linked with the patriotic struggle to give fuller play to the national power of Songun Korea.
					
					 Beautiful traits of loving the future and devoting oneself to the society, collective and comrades are being fully displayed among the young Korean people.
					
					 The boundless loyalty to the party and leader, the country and people and total dedication to them and noble morality and obligation for the society, collective and comrades are the qualities of the young Korean people who have been educated and grown under the care of the great party.
					
					 The idea of the youth movement of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their feats serve as eternal treasures for the strengthening of the Korean youth movement and its triumphant advance.
					
					 The future of Songun Korea is very rosy as there is the large contingent of the young vanguard straightly and dynamically advancing following the WPK, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon U.S. to Pay Heed to World Public Opinion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon U.S. to Pay Heed to World Public Opinion
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Global Post, a U.S. internet paper, recently conveyed news that about 100 politicians of the U.S., Japan, Europe, south Korea and other countries adopted "a peace declaration" at an international meeting.
					 The keynote of the declaration signed by former U.S. Vice-President Mondale, former Japanese Prime Minister Hatoyama and others is that the U.S., Japan and south Korea should take step for defusing tension and convert the instable armistice system into a peace one, to begin with, in order to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article says this proves that the world public opinion is asserting that the U.S. should make a switchover in its foreign policy for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is the source that turned the Korean Peninsula into the biggest hotspot in the world and a basic hurdle in the way of ensuring peace and security there, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has so far made proposals for turning the old armistice system into a peace one in order to remove the danger of war and ensure lasting peace on the peninsula, and repeatedly demanded the U.S. respond to them. The U.S. persists in refusing to accept the DPRK's fair and aboveboard peace proposals because they contradict the U.S. foreign policy for aggression. 
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK based on nuclear threat is not workable on the DPRK.
					
					 Steadfast is the stand of the DPRK to make positive contribution to defending peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in Asia.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defense as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy toward the former.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to pay heed to the world public opinion and make a policy switchover in a bold way, though belatedly.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked by Koreans in Uzbekistan 
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan held a meeting at its building on Aug. 22 on the occasion of the significant Day of Songun.
					 Present there were Chairman Ju Yong Il and officials of the association, heads of art troupes of Koreans, and compatriots.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the charge d'affaires ad interim and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Tashkent.
					
					 Ju Yong Il said that leader Kim Jong Il developed the Korean People's Army into the pillar and main force for carrying out the socialist cause, providing the eternal foundation to accomplish the socialist cause under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.title: Day of Songun Celebrated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Day of Songun Celebrated by Koreans in China
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held round-table talks on Aug. 25 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, made an address.
					
					 She said that Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army. This marked a historic occasion in heralding the new start of his Songun revolutionary leadership to accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche which was pioneered and has won with arms under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, she added.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed in Switzerland
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on August 18 on the occasion of the Day of Songun of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, Juche 49 (1960).
					
					 He guided combat and political trainings of soldiers, visiting lots of KPA units for several decades.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode of socialism.
					
					 Socialist Korea became a world political and military power, space power and nuclear weapons state under his care.
					
					 After his unexpected demise Marshal Kim Jong Un has carried forward the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 On the 2012 New Year day Kim Jong Un visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary leadership will defend peace on the Korean Peninsula and bring about national reunification.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on August 20 on the occasion of the DPRK's Day of Songun.
					 They included a meeting in Tajikistan, seminar, photo exhibition and film show in Bangladesh and film show in Malaysia.
					
					 Displayed in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos dealing with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films showing the invincible might of the Korean People's Army (KPA) which has grown up to be invincible revolutionary powerful army under the care of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said that the KPA has grown up to be matchless army even the U.S. imperialists trying to dominate the world dare not provoke.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said that the DPRK could continue winning in the severe confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialists and firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country thanks to the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded and developed in depth by the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The managing director of a Malaysian company stressed that the film offered an opportunity to know that thanks to the Songun politics the DPRK has became a country with a powerful national power despite the moves of the hostile forces to stifle it and their sanctions.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for National Liberation Praised by Bangladeshi Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for National Liberation Praised by Bangladeshi Media
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi newspapers and radio carried special write-ups and aired special program on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The News Today on August 13 carried an article titled "Savior of the Korean nation". It said:
					
					 The Korean nation was forced the miserable destiny as Japanese imperialists' colonial slaves in the first half of the last century.
					
					 It is President Kim Il Sung who liberated the Korean nation.
					
					 He embarked on the road of the national liberation struggle in his teens, founded the Juche idea, guiding idea in the era of independence, founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and aroused the whole nation to the sacred war for national liberation.
					
					 He achieved the cause of national liberation on August 15, 1945 by leading the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 The exploits for national liberation performed by the President, savior of the Korean nation, will be deeply kept in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 The Daily Industry on August 14 in an article titled "Historical significance of Korea's liberation" said that the President liberated the country and founded the Workers' Party of Korea, guiding force of hewing out the independent destiny of the popular masses, and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in which the people became masters.
					
					 The ATN TV broadcasting service introduced the immortal exploits performed by the President for national liberation on August 15 and 16.
					
					 It aired the scene of the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" and Korean film "Pyongyang Today".

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Marked Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign media marked the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation from August 14 to 17. 
					 The Cuban newspaper Granma on August 17 in an article said: 
					
					 August 15 marked the 70th anniversary of Korea's the liberation from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 A new history of Korea has begun since the day. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea through the anti-Japanese armed struggle. 
					
					 Right after the liberation he founded the Workers' Party of Korea, which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people, on October 10, 1945. 
					
					 He founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on September 9, 1948. 
					
					 The liberation of the country was the event which brought a historic turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people. 
					
					 The Prensa Latina News Agency of Cuba in an article said that not only the Korean people but the progressives of the world significantly greeted August 15. 
					
					 The Nigerian newspaper Statesman in an article titled "Noteworthy event in history of the Korean nation" said the President led the great anti-Japanese war to victory and that after the country's liberation he beat the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, and turned Korea into a socialist power independent, self-supporting and self-reliant in defence. 
					
					 The Angolan newspaper Jornal de Angola carried an article praising the exploits of the President who beat the Japanese imperialists with superb strategy and tactics, mysterious stratagem and war methods.

articles.title: Collection of Poems Published in Russia
articles.content:
Collection of Poems Published in Russia 
						
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A collection of poems "The Dawn of Hope" praising the greatness of supreme leader Kim Jong Un was published in Russia on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at a university in Moscow on Aug. 21.
					
					 Present there were the vice-director of the International Affairs Department of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia and other Russian figures of various circles.
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Lyudmila Abzeyeva, member of the Russian Union of Writers, said that the collection of poems is a serial of the collection of poems "The Eternal Sun of Hope" highly praising the ideological and theoretical feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their wise leadership and noble virtues.
					
					 The world-startling successes are being registered in the DPRK in recent years thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the idea and cause of the great leaders, she noted, expressing expectation that the collection of poem would encourage the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and make positive contribution to developing the cultural cooperation and friendly relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was published in pamphlet by the Penguin Publishing House of Ethiopia.
					 The talk, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il, clarifying the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and the tasks for brilliantly accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on August 20.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige reunion ampliada de CMC de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige reunion ampliada de CMC de PTC
						
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la reunion ampliada de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Asistieron los miembros de la CMC del PTC, los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC, los funcionarios directivos de la Direccion Politica General, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y los departamentos y secciones del Estado Mayor General, los comandantes de las unidades de los tipos de ejercito y de nivel de cuerpo del EPC, los miembros de mando de las academias militares a todos los niveles, los funcionarios directivos de los organos de Seguridad Estatal y de Seguridad del Pueblo, los del Comite Central del PTC, el Consejo de Ministros y de la rama de relaciones exteriores y los secretarios jefes de los comites provinciales del Partido. 
					
					En la reunion se analizaron las medidas revolucionarias tomadas por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC en la peor situacion al borde de la beligerancia, y los exitos, experiencias y lecciones adquiridos en el proceso de su ejecucion y se discutieron las importantes tareas estrategicas para consolidar por todos los medios la capacidad de defensa nacional.
					
					Y se abordo el problema de recuperacion de danos por inundaciones de la ciudad de Rason. Fueron destituidos o nombrados algunos miembros de la CMC del PTC y se discutio el problema de organizacion. 
					
					Tras informar detalladamente todo el proceso de la presente crisis, el Mariscal analizo los preparativos de las operaciones militares de las unidades del frente donde se declaro el estado de guerra, el trabajo de diferentes sectores de las zonas en estado de preguerra y el contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur.
					
					Dijo que aun en la situacion delicada el PTC ha manifestado su correcta capacidad directiva conduciendo a todo el pais, todo el pueblo y todo el ejercito y presentado las decisiones rotundas y las orientaciones estrategicas para superar las dificultades.
					
					Senalando que esta vez el frente y la retaguardia, el ejercito y el pueblo se han levantado con unico alma en la defensa de la patria, afirmo que es no visto el poderio de la unidad de todo el pais y todo el pueblo. 
					
					Apunto que en la voragine de la historia hemos defendido con nuestras propias fuerzas y sin el apoyo y simpatia de alguien la dignidad y la soberania de la patria, las conquistas de la revolucion y la felicidad del pueblo. 
					
					Esta vez, superamos la crisis tirante que se dirigia al choque armado al sostener con iniciativa el contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur y asi eliminamos el nubarron de guerra que se cernia a la nacion coreana y preservamos la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region, puntualizo.
					
					Senalo que la publicacion de la informacion conjunta en el contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur fue un importante motivo de viraje que alivio la critica tension militar y cambio las relaciones intercoreanas catastroficas a la reconciliacion y confianza.
					
					No se pueden cambiar con nada la soberania y el interes fundamental de la RPDC, recalco y agrego que son insignificantes el dialogo y el ambiente pacifico opuestos a ellos. 
					
					La tranquilidad rescatada en el umbral de la beligerancia, la hemos logrado no sobre la mesa de dialogo sino gracias a contar con la fuerte capacidad militar basada en el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo preparado por nuestro gran Partido y con los militares y civiles unidos compactamente en torno al Partido, apunto y senalo que el poderio militar de Songun y la unidad monolitica fortalecidos en medio de todas las tempestades del tiempo, sirven de garantia fundamental que permitio defender hoy y en el futuro tambien la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El Mariscal destaco otra vez la necesidad de poner la fuerza prioritaria a la intensificacion de la capacidad militar para la defensa estatal y presento las detalladas tareas estrategicas y remedios para el fin.
					
					En la ocasion, el Mariscal informo en detalles del estado de dano por inundacion surgida ultimamente en la ciudad de Rason y organizo el puesto de mando para la rehabilitacion de la ciudad de Rason tras dar la orden del Comandante Supremo de  que el EPC se encargue totalmente de esta labor y la cumpla perfectamente antes del dia de la fundacion del Partido.

articles.title: Cuadros del Partido y el Estado celebran Dia de Juventud con jovenes y estudiantes
articles.content:
Cuadros del Partido y el Estado celebran Dia de Juventud con jovenes y estudiantes
						
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea celebraron el dia 28 el Dia de la Juventud junto con los jovenes y estudiantes.
					  Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros junto con los funcionarios del centro y las localidades festejaron a los jovenes y estudiantes en la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon en el capitalino municipio de Sadong, el Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae, la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Politecnica Kim Chaek , la Granja Especializada en Verduras de Mangyongdae del capitalino municipio homonimo, el Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon, el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae y otras fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades.
					
					  Los cuadros rindieron junto con los jovenes y estudiantes sublime homenaje a los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu tras colocar cestos y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce, imagenes con amplia sonrisa, los murales de mosaico con sus imagenes, las lapidas a sus actividades historico-revolucionarias, etc.
					
					  Y pasaron revista a las salas de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, la presentacion del historial, lugares de produccion, etc. y estimularon a los jovenes y estudiantes ejemplares de la UJS.
					
					Y les encomendaron cumplir satisfactoriamente la mision y el deber de los creadores de milagros e innovaciones y de los precursores de la conquista de la tecnologia de punta en todos los dominios de la revolucion y de los duenos de la unica  potencia de jovenes.
					
					  Los jovenes y estudiantes llenos de alegria y optimismo pasaron alegres haciendo diversas actividades culturales, entre otras las funciones artisticas y los juegos deportivos y recreativos.

articles.title: Funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil por Dia de Juventud
articles.content:
Funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil por Dia de Juventud
						
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en la Casa Central de la Juventud una funcion del grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil por el Dia de la Juventud.
					En la funcion iniciada con los coros "Cancion de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung" y "Jubilo del pueblo" se presentaron el coro mixto en acompanamiento de armonica "Adelante los jovenes siguiendo al partido", el duo mixto "Fogata", el cuarteto mixto "Iremos al monte Paektu", el coro mixto "Tren hacia el frente" y otras piezas de diferentes formas. 
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las indelebles proezas de los grandes lideres antecesores, quines presentaron invariablemente la idea de dar importancia a la juventud como asunto mas importante de la revolucion y asentaron la base de eterna duracion de la construccion de la potencia de la juventud, y los nobles rasgos del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien continua la politica de amor por la juventud. 
					
					La funcion infundio a los espectadores la conviccion de que gracias al contingente de los jovenes mas excelentes crecidos en el regazo de los grandes hombres sin iguales, la patria brillara siempre como potencia de la juventud. 
					
					Se pusieron en la escena las piezas que reflejan el temperamento combativo y el optimismo de los jovenes. 
					
					Vieron la funcion el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, los funcionarios de la UJS, jovenes y estudiantes.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes bailan en el Dia de la Juventud
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes bailan en el Dia de la Juventud 
						
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- En ocasion del Dia de la Juventud los jovenes y estudiantes de la ciudad de Pyongyang bailaron el dia 28 por la noche en la Plaza Kim Il Sung.
					El baile se inicio a son de la melodia de la cancion "Marcha de los jovenes coreanos" en la que palpita el impetu de los jovenes coreanos.
					
					Los participantes bailaron con el ardiente sentimiento de veneracion al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien en acato al gran proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il prepara la nueva era de prosperidad del movimiento juvenil de Corea.
					
					Se veian el orgullo y la dignidad de los vanguardistas juveniles de la epoca del Songun en los rostros de los jovenes y estudiantes quienes bailan alegremente con las palmadas al compas de las canciones inclusive "Tharyong del monte oro", "Hulari" y "jovencito silbando". 
					
					Las canciones "Juventud y valentia", "brillaran la patria y la juventud", "Victoria continua generacion tras generacion" y otras llevaron al climax el ambiente del baile.
					
					Tambien, los coreanos residentes en ultramar y los huespedes extranjeros bailaron compartiendo la alegria de la fiesta junto con los jovenes coreanos.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por 55o aniversario de establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por 55o aniversario de establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas
						
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- El embajador cubano en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez ofrecio el dia 28 en su sede diplomatica un banquete por el 55o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Cuba.
					Fueron invitados alli el canciller Ri Su Yong, la presidenta del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, el subdirector de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Pak kun Phal, el director de la Direccion General de Trabajo con el Cuerpo Diplomatico, Sim Kuk Ryong  y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la sede diplomatica de Cuba.
					
					En su discurso el embajador cubano se refirio al hecho de que en el pasado, el pueblo cubano y el coreano han venido desplegando una dinamica lucha conjunta por defender la soberania en la confrontacion con el imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Enfatizo su conviccion de que bajo la sabia direccion del companero Kim Jong Un el pueblo coreano manifestara tambien en el futuro la victoria y el orgullo.
					
					Agrego que el pueblo cubano desarrollara mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion preparadas por los lideres antecesores de ambos paises y fortalecera la colaboracion bilateral en la palestra internacional.
					
					El canciller coreano dijo que bajo la acertada direccion del companero Raul Castro Ruz el pueblo cubano logra nuevos exitos en la lucha por defender las conquistas socialistas frustrando paso a paso las maniobras del imperialismo yanqui y sus lacayos.
					
					Se refirio al hecho de que los grandes lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il dispensaron la ayuda material y espiritual a la lucha del pueblo cubano en el tiempo en que el imperialismo norteamericano se desesperaba perversamente para eliminar en su cuna la revolucion cubana triunfada.
					
					Senalo que durante los 55 anos pasados las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises han venido intensificandose sin cesar en varias esferas inclusive la politica, la economia, los asuntos militares y la cultura.
